item.title: CVE-2024-31100|2024-03-31T18:26:31.355Z -- Festi-Team -- Popup Cart Lite for WooCommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Festi-Team Popup Cart Lite for WooCommerce.This issue affects Popup Cart Lite for WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.1.
